sentences.en: A dope mix is prepared by intimately mixing the following ingredients.
sentences.cn: 通过密切混合下列成分,来制止漆状混合物.

sentences.en: From ten feet apart they were locked in to one another, solidly, intimately, and inextricably.
sentences.cn: 他们在相距十英尺外紧紧拴在一起, 牢固地, 亲密地, 难分难解.

sentences.en: He did not feel he had got to know them intimately.
sentences.cn: 他认为他没必要和他们密切来往。

sentences.en: He was — what is the phrase I'm looking for — not intimately acquainted with his subject.
sentences.cn: 他——我该怎么说呢——对自己的课程很不熟悉.

sentences.en: If other men spoke to her intimately he was immediately jealous.
sentences.cn: 一见到别的男人跟她亲热地说话,他便醋意大发.

sentences.en: In some high - grade ores, phenocrysts adhere intimately to the pseudomorphs.
sentences.cn: 在有些高级矿石内, 斑晶紧连着假晶.

sentences.en: Maybe your relationships will be your primary focus for a period of life, as well as learning how to cultivate them more intimately and intelligently.
sentences.cn: 或许生活中的一段时期，你的主要焦点是人际关系，了解怎样聪明地培养人际亲密关系成为了关注点。

sentences.en: Mr Joe knew everyone intimately and never used a first name.
sentences.cn: 乔先生跟每个人都十分熟悉,但却从来不直呼其名.

sentences.en: Only someone knowing the terrain intimately could have picked his way through all that underbrush.
sentences.cn: 只有熟知这一带地势的人才能择路穿行那片矮树林.

sentences.en: Property and equities are intimately connected in Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 在香港，房地产与证券密切关联。

sentences.en: The book authentically and intimately describes the small details of her daily life.
sentences.cn: 本书翔实地记述了她日常生活中的小细节。

sentences.en: The torque of the couple is intimately associated with a couple.
sentences.cn: 力偶矩与力偶密切相关.

sentences.en: These factors interact intimately and cannot be separated.
sentences.cn: 这些因素相互之间紧密联系,不能分开.

sentences.en: Upon whose Bosom snow has lain ; Who intimately lives with rain.
sentences.cn: 皑雪曾落在她怀抱里,她和雨相处亲密.

sentences.en: You have to be willing to get to know yourself and your partner intimately.
sentences.cn: 你必须愿意在恋爱中逐渐认识自己和伴侣。

words.tran_cn: 亲密的；私人的；精通的；有性关系的

trans.tran_cn: 熟悉地，亲密地，私下地，谙熟地
